title: NYX Round Case Lipstick Lip Cream 595 Strawberry Milk
description: NYX Cosmetics Round Lipstick Lip Cream 595 Strawberry Milk.  A velvet-textured lipstick formulated with mineral oils to provide moisturizing benefits and rich colors.   NYX's top selling lipstick, the Round Lipstick offers long-lasting, non-smudging color.

title: Deva Curl Set it Free 6 oz.
description: Put an end to frizz with this 24-48 hour moisture lock. Adds shine and defines curls with a long lasting hold. Scented with zesty lemon-lime. Not tested on animals. Made in USA.

title: Deva: DevaCurl One Conditioner + No-Poo, 32 oz Combo
description: DevaCurl DUO: DevaCurl OneCondition 32 oz and DevaCurl NoPoo Shampoo 32 oz
